attributes.action: Create a Covid Memorial in Mary Steven’s Park, Stourbridge.
attributes.additional_details: There are a lot of people who didn’t get to have proper funerals or memorial services or even get to say goodbye and I feel like this would be a good thing in the community for people to see.
attributes.background: I would like to start a campaign to get a memorial put in place in Mary Steven’s Park or locally for all those that lost their lives to covid.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local memorials are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
